metadata.Title: CVE-2021-34813 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: Matrix libolm before 3.2.3 allows a malicious Matrix homeserver to crash a client (while it is attempting to retrieve an Olm encrypted room key backup from the homeserver) because olm_pk_decrypt has a stack-based buffer overflow. Remote code execution might be possible for some nonstandard build configurations.

criterions.comment: olm package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
